article.title: U.S. Navy Purchases Sonobuoys
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ERAPSCO, Columbia City, Indiana, is being awarded a $12,950,260 contract modification to exercise an option for the procurement of 17,000 AN/SSQ-53F sonobuoys for the U.S. Navy. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
